name: Website Development
description: Custom React.js website development
Responsive web design (desktop, tablet, mobile optimization)
Single-page applications (SPA)

name: UI/UX Implementation
description: Conversion of UI/UX designs (Figma, Sketch, Adobe XD) into responsive React components
Creation of custom UI components and libraries
Material-UI or Tailwind CSS integration

name: Web Performance Optimization
description: Optimizing React applications for faster load times
Code splitting, lazy loading, and tree shaking
Reducing bundle size and improving Lighthouse scores

name: Frontend Architecture Design
description: Scalable component architecture
State management solutions using Redux, Context API, or Zustand
Server-side rendering (SSR) with Next.js

name: Third-party Integrations
description: Integration with APIs, payment gateways, or analytics tools
Social media integration (login, sharing, etc.)
Charting and data visualization tools (Chart.js, D3.js)

name: Maintenance & Updates
description: Bug fixes and performance improvements
Adding new features or modules to existing React applications
Migrating legacy projects to React

name: Landing Page Development
description: Personal and business portfolios
Landing pages for product launches or marketing campaigns
Interactive single-page sites

name: E-commerce Frontend Development
description: Developing e-commerce store interfaces with React
Integration with CMSs like Shopify or headless solutions

name: Dashboard Development
description: Custom dashboard creation for business analytics
Role-based access and user management

name: Progressive Web Applications
description: Developing React-based PWAs
Offline functionality and push notifications

name: Tailored Services
description: Custom scrollbar or animations
SEO-friendly React apps
Accessibility compliance (WCAG standards)

name: Code Review and Consultancy
description: Reviewing and refactoring existing React codebases
Providing guidance on React best practices and tools
Setting up development workflows with tools like ESLint, Prettier, and Git
